comment: Very unclear and unhelpful. Will refuse to answer questions even though directions were impossible to follow. Drop the class if you get her

She is extremely easy but she is very unorganized and is not very clear in giving directions. She loves what she does and is a very nice and caring woman but not very organized and never misses class. I had to ask frequent questions to make sure i was doing the right assignment because she was so unclear.
She is early to class most of the time. She never misses a Class. However she seems very forgetful.
